title: eLLaLavEnum
sahitya:
eLLaLavEnum karuNai koLLa vENum enpAl puLLi mayil mElamar vaLLi maNavALanE


anupallavi

  kaLLam kapaTamillA uLLam enaadil unnaik-karudik-kaDai tErum urudi yAn aDaindiDa 


caraNam    bandha pAsha vinaiyAl enda vidamum nAn nondu naliyA varam tandaruLa vENumE
sendUrt-talam tEDi vandun pugazh pADi vandanai purindiDum endaniDam parindu
